title: Bruiser Graves
body:
Thoughts?

I've been thinking something like BC/Bork/defensive. If you pick up defensive items that give cdr, you end up with a super low cooldown on your E since it scales well with cdr given it's flat reduction. Q is a multi-hit so BC stacks a bit faster, and you get more tank stats from your passive anyway.

So far it seems pretty fun.
